贒字的基本解释

贒
xián
古同“贤”。

贒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》胡田切，平先，匣。］
亦作“臤1”。“贤1”的繁体字。亦作“贒1”。
(1)有德行；多才能。
(2)指有德行或有才能的人。
(3)优良，美善。
(4)尊崇；器重。
(5)胜过；超过。
(6)辛劳。
(7)对人的敬词。冠于某些称谓之前。
(8)作第二人称的尊称。犹君或公。亦径作“你”用。
[②]［xiàn］
［《集韻》形甸切，去霰，匣。］
“贤2”的繁体字。
车毂一端的大孔。

贒字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　贒； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1213第01
【集韻】賢，古作贒。註詳八畫。

贒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
贒字的起名意思

暂无。

Ye
Basic explanation of words
Ye
xián
Gu Tong "sage".
Ye
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" Hu Tianqie, Pingxian, Xie. ]
Also known as "臤1". Traditional characters for "贤1". Also known as "Yi 1".
(1) Be virtuous; have many talents.
(2) Refers to the virtuous or talented person.
(3) Good and good.
(4) Respect; respect.
(5) To exceed; to exceed.
(6) Hard work.
(7) Respect for people. Crowned before certain titles.
(8) As the honorific name of the second person. You Jun or Gong. It is also used as "you".
[②]［xiàn］
["Jiyun" cut in shape, go to chai, box. ]
Traditional characters for "贤2".
A large hole at one end of the hub.
Ye
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　贒; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1213 No. 01
[Ji Yun] Xian, ancient works. Note the eight paintings in detail.
